doc.title: Green Sky Dessert: The Disco Dancing Dessert Man!
doc.text: As/IN dusk/NN sets/NNS in/IN ,/, the/DT disco/NN music/NN starts/VBZ up/NN and/CC Finding/VBG Nemo/JJ starts/NNS playing/IN on/IN the/DT LCD/JJ screen/NN in/IN front/NN of/IN the/DT stall/NN ./. The/DT audience/NN start/VB lining/VB up/VB as/IN this/DT Ice/JJ Kachang/NN Man/NN starts/VBZ his/PRP$ nightly/NN breakdancing/IN routine/JJ ./. Oh/EX yes/EX ,/, some/NN stalls/NNS have/VBP got/VBN good/JJ food/NN ,/, some/NN stalls/NNS have/VBP good/JJ service/NN ,/, but/CC this/DT stall/NN has/VBZ all/RB the/DT above/JJ plus/JJ entertainment/NN at/IN no/DT extra/JJ charge/NN ./. Looking/JJ at/IN the/DT queue/NN of/IN people/NN lining/NN up/NN behind/IN him/PRP ,/, I/PRP can/MD see/VB why/WRB this/DT guy/NN is/VBZ dancing/RB ./. It/PRP sort/NN of/IN reminds/VBG me/PRP of/IN the/DT dancing/JJ traffic/NN policemen/NN that/IN direct/NN traffic/NN in/IN Thailand/NN ./. It/PRP is/VBZ heartening/JJ to/TO see/VB that/IN some/JJ people/NN simply/NN do/VB enjoy/VB their/PRP$ work/NN !/. So/RB is/VBZ this/DT dessert/NN stall/NN really/RB worth/JJ all/IN the/DT lights/NN and/CC music/NN ?/. Being/VBG really/RB full/JJ already/RB ,/, I/PRP only/RB managed/VBD to/TO try/VB the/DT Tau/NN Suan/NN which/WDT the/DT man/NN himself/PRP said/JJ was/VBD the/DT best/JJS selling/VBG item/NN in/IN the/DT stall/NN ./. And/CC the/DT Tau/NN Suan/NN was/VBD good/JJ !/. I/PRP especially/RB liked/VBD the/DT strong/JJ pandan/NN fragrance/NN of/IN the/DT soup/NN and/CC it/PRP was/VBD not/RB overly/RB thick/JJ and/CC sweet/JJ ./. The/DT mung/NN beans/NNS were/VBD of/IN the/DT right/NN texture/NN and/CC firm/JJ to/TO the/DT bite/VB ./.
